content.p: From generous annual leave to top health facilities, we offer a range of benefits that reward our staff for their contribution to the University. We recognise all our staff have different priorities and lifestyles, so we make sure there are benefits to suit everyone. The University Employee Hub is the place you can access all the benefits that are available to you as a member of staff. We offer benefits in a range of areas: You can search the whole A-Z of benefits online. A-Z of services A-Z of policies Forms
